sqlMap.select: SELECT personCode, personName, personPhone, personEmail, personSex, personPhoto FROM person WHERE isEnabled=1 and (personName like #personName# or personCode like #personCode# or personPhone like #personPhone# or personEmail like #personEmail# or personSex like #personSex#)

SELECT count(*) as count FROM person WHERE isEnabled=1 and (personName like #personName# or personCode like #personCode# or personPhone like #personPhone# or personEmail like #personEmail# or personSex like #personSex#) limit #startValue#,#endValue#
SELECT personCode, personName, personPhone, personEmail, personSex, personPhoto FROM person WHERE personCode = #personCode# and isEnabled=1
SELECT count(*) as countValue FROM person where isEnabled=1
SELECT personCode, personName, personPhone, personEmail, personSex, personPhoto FROM person where isEnabled=1 limit #startValue#,#endValue#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE person SET personName=#personName#, personPhone=#personPhone#, personEmail=#personEmail#, personSex=#personSex#, personPhoto=#personPhoto#, isEnabled=1 WHERE personCode= #personCode#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE person SET isEnabled=0 WHERE personCode= #personCode#
